ComicInfo.Penciller: Dick Dillin,George Roussos,Henry Boltinoff,Howard Purcell,Morris Waldinger,Mort Drucker,Mort Meskin,Mort Meskin,Howard Purcell,George Roussos,Morris Waldinger,Mort Drucker,Henry Boltinoff
ComicInfo.Summary:
The proprietors of the Mystery Museum are about to close it down due to bad business, but a man shows up who agrees to do demonstrations of real magic. However, he really only wants access to the magic cauldron on display, which will give him fantastic powers he can use for criminal purposes.
An ancient feud between two Scottish clans re-emerges in the present, with the head of each clan using hereditary magical powers in the fight.
Aliens plot to turn humans into water-breathers, then to force them into the ocean so that the surface world can be occupied.
ComicInfo.Writer: Henry Boltinoff,Julius Schwartz,Mort Drucker,Julius Schwartz,Mort Drucker,Henry Boltinoff
ComicInfo.Title: The Mystery of the Magic Museum; Clash of the Clan Masters; Menace of the Alien Hero; Best Foot Forward...
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
